description.narrative: -Addressing the challenge of orphan and vulnerable children and their families through provision of integrated alternative family and community based child care protection support including: psychosocial counselling, economic training, educational, health, family sponsorship and capacity building support -Supporting school age boys and girls poorly performing in their schooling due to economic problems through provision of school materials, creating access to tutor service, provision of psychosocial support and capacity building - Enhancing the economic situation, saving culture and developing business management entrepreneurial skill of families affected and living in poverty -Improving the situation of men women and children affected by socio-economic problem through provision integrated service provision including basic necessities, capacity development support provision and enhancing their awareness -Supporting environmental protection initiative in rural and urban areas to contribute to the establishment of safe environment for marginalised communities - Mitigating the challenge of drug addiction among youth through intervention targeting awareness creation about the problem and provision of rehabilitation support - Reducing the negative impact of traffic accident through enhancing the awareness of the community and provision of integrated support for people affected - Providing integrated need based support to improve the situation of disabled people and their family -Provision of integrated economic psychosocial, health, recreation, awareness creation, capacity building support to people affected by health problems including mental illnesses and HIV/AIDS -Supporting children and elderly and providing integrated socio-economic support
